item.title: Analysis: Block‚Äôs retreat to 2019 scale could be a hint of deeper shifts in payments economics
item.description: While Jack Dorsey cites AI-enabled productivity gains as the reason for Block's cuts, the deeper shift is in payments plumbing: stablecoin settlement threatens to compress the fee stack that fintech acquirers have relied on for years.

item.title: World Liberty Financial ties voting power to staking as USD1 supply tops $4.7 Billion
item.description: The proposal redirects stablecoin arbitrage from institutional market makers to large token holders and links voting rights to capital commitment.

item.title: Crypto analyst says Bitcoin selling pressure is nearly exhausted
item.description: Bitcoin has been given some reprieve to trade sideways for a few weeks, but it won't likely emerge from the woods until the fourth quarter, says crypto analyst Willy Woo.

item.title: Ether could stay 'subdued' in the weeks ahead: Analyst
item.description: Swyftx lead analyst Pav Hundal says near-term uncertainty has already been priced into Ether, and without any surprise catalysts, it will likely trade sideways for now.

item.title: Ransomware incidents up 50% in 2025, but payments stay flat
item.description: A new Chainalysis report suggests ransomware attackers are ‚Äúworking harder for diminishing returns‚Äù as regulatory pressure and refusals to pay have hurt ransom proceeds.

item.description: The Ethereum co-founder said four areas that need changes include validator signatures, data storage, user accounts and proofs, but the evolution won‚Äôt be easy.

item.title: MARA Shares Rise After Bitcoin Miner Strikes AI Data Center Deal
item.description: The Bitcoin miner moved to convert U.S. sites into AI-ready campuses, though analysts say confirmed tenants will be key.

item.description: Santiment highlighted that just seven more wallets are needed to reach 20,000 holding at least 100 Bitcoin each, amid ongoing market uncertainty.

item.description: Block said the restructuring will cost up to $500 million and be largely completed by mid-2026, as investors embraced the move.
